long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snake is a game genre in which the player controls a developing line that eventually becomes its own principal barrier. The player controls a dot, square, or object on the playing board. It creates a trail behind it as it goes ahead, mimicking a snake.

How to Play: 
Move around with the arrow keys and eat the dots. Avoid crushing yourself.

History:
Worm, the earliest known home computer version, was created in 1978 by Peter Trefonas on the TRS-80 computer.

Technical Note:
This extension uses a WebAssembely built on the snake, and it is optimized to run in the popup area. The extension runs in a sandboxed environment, and it works completely offline. Visit the FAQs page for more info.
